db:abstract.db:para: Provides a way to apply a 4x4 tranformation matrix to an Item.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The Matrix4x4 type provides a way to apply a transformation to an Item through a 4x4 matrix.
It allows for a combination of rotation, scale, translatation and shearing by using just one tranformation provided in a 4x4-matrix.
